statements: UPDATE nft_table SET owner_address='0x1234567890' WHERE id=1
UPDATE nft_table SET is_sold=true, nft_name='Art NFT' WHERE id=2
UPDATE nft_table SET nft_name = 'Artwork 123', owner_address = '0x1234567890' WHERE id = 1 AND is_sold = FALSE;
UPDATE nft_table SET owner_address = '0x9876543210', is_sold = TRUE WHERE nft_name = 'Digital Token' AND id = 2;
UPDATE NFTs SET price = 450.00, is_sold = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE NFTTransactions SET buyer = 'Alice', date_sold = '2022-01-15' WHERE transaction_id = 3;
UPDATE NFTs SET price = 1500.75, is_sold = TRUE WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE NFTTransactions SET buyer = 'Alice', date_sold = '2022-09-15' WHERE transaction_id = 456;
UPDATE NFTs SET description='Updated description' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE Transaction SET amount=50, timestamp='2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE id=3;

UPDATE Transactions SET trans_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE seller_id = 3;
